body.p: The affiant Mary Yaner states on Oath that She is the wife of Frederick Yaner who is at this time confined in the Penatenitiary of the state and that the statements contained in the petition heare unto attached are twice
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 12th day of Dec 1861
Jos Clement J. P. J. C

Anna Smith States on Oath that She is the same person mentioned in the petition heare unto attached and that she has arrived to the age of seventeen years That at the time of the trail of her Step Father F. Yanner in the Circuit of Jefferson County of the charge mentioned in the petition She was greatly embarased and fritened being very Young she dose not recollect all the statements She then made before the Jury She futher States that she has reflected considerably on the case up to this time and is of opinion that Yaner being Beastly intoxicated at the time said act was commited for
which he was convicted could not have been conscius of what he did ^if gilty^ further that Yanner up to that time on all occasions treated her with kindness and affection She would therefore request his pardon
Subscribed and sworn before me this 12th day of Dec 1861
Jos Clement J P J C
